description:
Did you know that the wiring in your brain influences how you act, react, and interact the way you do? The good news is that you can enrich your life by changing your brain wiring.

Ninety-five percent of your behavior reflects patterns and habits mostly acquired when you were very young.

What are your self-limiting beliefs?

How can you Rewire your Brain? Simple:

  • learning
  • emotional change
  • personal development

Brian has woven this live personal growth workshop into a Udemy course complete with quizzes and supplemental materials.

The one-hour workshop is divided into three parts:

  1. Explore ways to remove blockages
  2. Examine why some people are reluctant to set goals
  3. Encourage the design of an action plan

As a hypnotherapist, Brian is well aware of challenges people have in their journey of personal change and growth. To support you in your journey of change, he has included a downloadable MP3 guided-self-hypnosis audio.

If you think there is more to life, and you just simply need a bit of guidance and assistance, make a decision now and sign up.

Here is a list of the bonuses included:

  • MP3: Guided self-hypnosis audio "Personal Growth Activator"
  • PDF: Positive Coping Strategies
  • PDF: Brian 's Building Blocks For Success
  • Chart: Success Is Determined By Choices
  • Chart: Mind Body Feedback Loop
  • PDF: Brian Walsh Product Descriptions
title: Rewire Your Brain to Purge Negative Habits and Attitudes
